abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders beat Minnesota Wild, 4-1; other pro hockey news noted.

headline.print_headline: Nielsen Scores Twice as Surging Islanders Turn Back the Wild
headline.main: Frans Nielsen Helps Surging Islanders Turn Back the Wild

snippet: Nielsen scored on a power play in the first period and added a short-handed empty-netter in the third while John Tavares had a goal and an assist.
lead_paragraph: Nielsen scored on a power play in the first period and added a short-handed empty-netter in the third while John Tavares had a goal and an assist.
